Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It doesn't make a huge impact. GenAI is favorable in this instance as the AI is available at an instant and can substitute when a tutor is unavailable in certain hours of the day, especially when students are rushing their assignment last hour.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel like feedback I could get from teachers are more credible and reliable than that given by GenAI as teachers have more knowledge and set expectations on what they want to receive from us to grade, allowing us more insight as how to do our assignment.
